name: Silva Trail Runner 4 Headlamp
description: With just a high and a low mode, there's nothing to get in the way of your "go mode." The Trail Runner 4 is a simplified, but not basic, headlamp that exists to illuminate your low-light runs. Equipped with Silva’s intelligent lighting optics, it offers a mix of flood and spot lighting, letting you see where you're headed and where you are.Intelligent lighting combines flood and spot lighting, covering the near and the far.AAA battery pack offers convenience while traveling – the AAA is the world’s second most readily available battery.Battery extension cord gives you the option of putting the battery pack in your bag or inside a jacket pocket. This both removes weight from your head and lets you keep the batteries warm for better cold-weather performance.Battery pack has a loop to attach a safety light.LED power indicator lets you know when your batteries need changing.Anti-slip headband stays in place when on the move.Large, 1-button interface is easy to use with or without gloves.Lumens and runtimes measured to the ANSI/NEMA FL1 standard.IPX5 waterproofing stands up to any weather you’re willing to go out in.In the box: Trail Runner 4 headlamp, 3 AAA batteries, 3 AAA battery holder and extension cable.
